description:
1.2.1 Update: 
          *-New logo! 
          *-Picture Support!! 
          *-Refreshed UI
          *-Logo now shows up properly in app catalog 
          *-Minor bug fixes & improvements 
Bring all the power of Quizlet with you wherever you go with Study Buddy! Designed for Quizlet users by Quizlet users, it has all the power of Quizlet, with a design that’s made specifically for webOS. With Study Buddy, you can utilize both the familiarize and learn modes of Quizlet. Get to know your terms quickly with a simple, streamlined interface! Quizlet is the largest flashcard database on the internet, allowing you to study anything you want, whether you're a student preparing for a history test or you want to refresh yourself on the states. It’s your choice. With a phone this powerful, you shouldn’t have to compromise on the way you learn, and with Study Buddy, you don't have to!
